title: Flor Salvaje
overview: Amanda Monteverde lives through the unfortunate death of her mother and her brother and tries to escape her stormy past. Despite being young, she feels responsible for her three younger sisters, and comes to a small town called "Nueva Esperanza," which is starting in the oil industry. While there, Amanda goes through even more difficult situations, but she also finds love. Three different men impact her life: Sacramento, her faithful friend and innocent love; Pablo Aguilar, her joy and passion; and finally, Don Rafael Urrieta, the most powerful man in town who tries to be her lord and master.
